snippet: The official Canadian position was support for the Keystone XL project, but the new prime minister appeared to be unenthusiastic about it.
abstract: Pres Obama's rejection of Keystone XL pipeline comes as relief to Canada's newly-elected liberal government under Prime Min Justin Trudeau; move frees Trudeau of obligation to pursue pipeline he showed little enthusiasm for and to instead focus on improving Canada's greenhouse gas emissions record.
lead_paragraph: The official Canadian position was support for the Keystone XL project, but the new prime minister appeared to be unenthusiastic about it.

headline.main: Keystone XL Decision by Obama Takes Weight Off Trudeau
headline.print_headline: A Decision by Obama Takes Weight Off Trudeau
